languages.text: Машинные палубы превратились в диковинные сады. В нескольких местах появились конструкции, формой напоминающие растения Терры, однако поверхность их была полностью зеркальна. Отражения, идеально повторяя окружающие предметы, не показывали ни единого живого существа. Вместо тех, кто заглядывал в них, в зеркалах мелькали кровавые гротескные твари, похожие на раздутых глубоководных рыб с парой-тройкой когтистых лап. Не сумев уничтожить зловещие предметы, пустотники укрыли их пласталевыми колпаками, пока выход из Имматериума не избавил корабль от скверны.

traits.locale_text: Машинные палубы превратились в диковинные сады. В нескольких местах появились конструкции, формой напоминающие растения Терры, однако поверхность их была полностью зеркальна. Отражения, идеально повторяя окружающие предметы, не показывали ни единого живого существа. Вместо тех, кто заглядывал в них, в зеркалах мелькали кровавые гротескные твари, похожие на раздутых глубоководных рыб с парой-тройкой когтистых лап. Не сумев уничтожить зловещие предметы, пустотники укрыли их пласталевыми колпаками, пока выход из Имматериума не избавил корабль от скверны.

languages.text: The engine decks were transformed into exotic gardens. Several chambers sprouted foliage vaguely resembling the plants on Terra, although they exhibited a glass-like surface polished to a mirror sheen. While reflections in the plants perfectly copied the surrounding objects, they did not show a single living being. Those who peered into them saw grotesque blood-covered creatures instead, not unlike bloated abyssal fish with a pair of clawed limbs, sometimes more. Unable to destroy the sinister growth, the voidsmen covered it with plasteel hoods until leaving the Immaterium, finally ridding the vessel of the corruption.

Отражения, идеально повторяя окружающие предметы, не показывали ни единого живого существа. Вместо тех, кто заглядывал в них, в зеркалах мелькали кровавые гротескные твари, похожие на раздутых глубоководных рыб с парой-тройкой когтистых лап. Не сумев уничтожить зловещие предметы, пустотники укрыли их пласталевыми колпаками, пока выход из Имматериума не избавил корабль от скверны.

traits.locale_text: The engine decks were transformed into exotic gardens. Several chambers sprouted foliage vaguely resembling the plants on Terra, except their surface was glass-like and polished to a mirror sheen. While the reflections perfectly copied the surrounding objects, they did not show a single living being. Those who peered in saw grotesque blood-covered creatures instead, not unlike bloated abyssal fish with a pair of clawed limbs and sometimes more. Unable to destroy the sinister growth, the voidsmen covered it with plasteel hoods until leaving the Immaterium rid the vessel of the corruption.

The engine decks were transformed into exotic gardens. Several chambers sprouted foliage vaguely resembling the plants on Terra, although they exhibited a glass-like surface polished to a mirror sheen. While reflections in the plants perfectly copied the surrounding objects, they did not show a single living being. Those who peered into them saw grotesque blood-covered creatures instead, not unlike bloated abyssal fish with a pair of clawed limbs, sometimes more. Unable to destroy the sinister growth, the voidsmen covered it with plasteel hoods until leaving the Immaterium, finally ridding the vessel of the corruption.

languages.text: 引擎甲板变成了充满异界情调的花园，几个船舱里长出了如同泰拉植物的枝叶，但这些植物表面却呈现出宛如玻璃镜面般的光亮。植物表面的倒影完美地反射着周围的一切，但却没有映出任何生物的倒影。那些朝镜面里看去的人，只能看到某种浑身是血的奇怪生物，外形仿佛臃肿的深海鱼一样，但却长着一对爪肢，有些甚至长着更多爪肢。由于无法摧毁这种邪恶的生物，船员们用塑钢头盔盖住了它。直到舰船离开亚空间之后，这些腐化之物才彻底消失。
languages.original_text: The engine decks were transformed into exotic gardens. Several chambers sprouted foliage vaguely resembling the plants on Terra, although they exhibited a glass-like surface polished to a mirror sheen. While reflections in the plants perfectly copied the surrounding objects, they did not show a single living being. Those who peered into them saw grotesque blood-covered creatures instead, not unlike bloated abyssal fish with a pair of clawed limbs, sometimes more. Unable to destroy the sinister growth, the voidsmen covered it with plasteel hoods until leaving the Immaterium, finally ridding the vessel of the corruption.

traits.locale_text: 引擎甲板变成了充满异界情调的花园，几个船舱里长出了如同泰拉植物的枝叶，但这些植物表面却呈现出宛如玻璃镜面般的光亮。植物表面的倒影完美地反射着周围的一切，但却没有映出任何生物的倒影。那些朝镜面里看去的人，只能看到某种浑身是血的奇怪生物，外形仿佛臃肿的深海鱼一样，但却长着一对爪肢，有些甚至长着更多爪肢。由于无法摧毁这种邪恶的生物，船员们用塑钢头盔盖住了它。直到舰船离开亚空间之后，这些腐化之物才彻底消失。

languages.text: Las cubiertas de máquinas se transformaron en jardines exóticos. En varias cámaras brotaba un follaje muy parecido al de las plantas de Terra, aunque con una superficie de cristal pulida como un espejo. Aunque los reflejos en las plantas copiaban perfectamente los objetos circundantes, no mostraban ni un solo ser vivo. Los que se asomaban a ellas veían criaturas grotescas cubiertas de sangre, parecidas a peces abisales hinchados con un par de extremidades con garras, a veces más. Incapaces de destruir aquel siniestro organismo, los soldados del vacío lo cubrieron con capuchas de plastiacero hasta que abandonaron el Inmaterio, deshaciéndose por fin de la corrupción.
languages.original_text: The engine decks were transformed into exotic gardens. Several chambers sprouted foliage vaguely resembling the plants on Terra, although they exhibited a glass-like surface polished to a mirror sheen. While reflections in the plants perfectly copied the surrounding objects, they did not show a single living being. Those who peered into them saw grotesque blood-covered creatures instead, not unlike bloated abyssal fish with a pair of clawed limbs, sometimes more. Unable to destroy the sinister growth, the voidsmen covered it with plasteel hoods until leaving the Immaterium, finally ridding the vessel of the corruption.

En varias cámaras brotaba un follaje muy parecido al de las plantas de Terra, aunque con una superficie de cristal pulida como un espejo. Aunque los reflejos en las plantas copiaban perfectamente los objetos circundantes, no mostraban ni un solo ser vivo. Los que se asomaban a ellas veían criaturas grotescas cubiertas de sangre, parecidas a peces abisales hinchados con un par de extremidades con garras, a veces más. Incapaces de destruir aquel siniestro organismo, los soldados del vacío lo cubrieron con capuchas de plastiacero hasta que abandonaron el Inmaterio, deshaciéndose por fin de la corrupción.

languages.text: エンジンデッキが南国風の庭園に姿を変えた。いくつかの部屋は、どことなく地球の植物に似た葉を生やしたものの、表面はガラスのようで、鏡のツヤのような光沢感がある。植物は周囲の物体を完全に反射して映すというのに、命ある生き物はひとつとして映さない。それを覗き込んだ者達は、自身の代わりにグロテスクな血まみれの生き物を目にした。爪のある手足のブクブクとした深海魚の姿だけではなく、時にはもっとひどい姿の場合もある。不吉な植物を除去できず、ヴォイズマンは非物質世界を離れるまでプラスチールフードでそれを覆い、最後には船から腐敗を排除した。
languages.original_text: The engine decks were transformed into exotic gardens. Several chambers sprouted foliage vaguely resembling the plants on Terra, although they exhibited a glass-like surface polished to a mirror sheen. While reflections in the plants perfectly copied the surrounding objects, they did not show a single living being. Those who peered into them saw grotesque blood-covered creatures instead, not unlike bloated abyssal fish with a pair of clawed limbs, sometimes more. Unable to destroy the sinister growth, the voidsmen covered it with plasteel hoods until leaving the Immaterium, finally ridding the vessel of the corruption.

traits.locale_text: エンジンデッキが南国風の庭園に姿を変えた。いくつかの部屋は、どことなく地球の植物に似た葉を生やしたものの、表面はガラスのようで、鏡のツヤのような光沢感がある。植物は周囲の物体を完全に反射して映すというのに、命ある生き物はひとつとして映さない。それを覗き込んだ者達は、自身の代わりにグロテスクな血まみれの生き物を目にした。爪のある手足のブクブクとした深海魚の姿だけではなく、時にはもっとひどい姿の場合もある。不吉な植物を除去できず、ヴォイズマンは非物質世界を離れるまでプラスチールフードでそれを覆い、最後には船から腐敗を排除した。

languages.text: La salle des moteurs s'est transformée en jardin exotique. Un feuillage luxuriant pousse dans plusieurs salles, des plantes ressemblant vaguement à celles de Terra, mais dont la surface est semblable à du verre poli comme un miroir. Étrangement, le reflet que renvoient les plantes reproduit à la perfection l'environnement qui l'entoure, mais sans aucun être vivant. Ceux qui ont osé s'approcher y ont vu des créatures ubuesques recouvertes de sang, qui ne sont pas sans rappeler les poissons abyssaux boursouflés dotés d'une ou plusieurs paires de membres griffus. Dans l'incapacité de détruire la sinistre croissance, les cosmomarins la recouvrent de chapes de plastacier jusqu'à la sortie de l'Immaterium, qui met automatiquement fin à la corruption.
languages.original_text: The engine decks were transformed into exotic gardens. Several chambers sprouted foliage vaguely resembling the plants on Terra, although they exhibited a glass-like surface polished to a mirror sheen. While reflections in the plants perfectly copied the surrounding objects, they did not show a single living being. Those who peered into them saw grotesque blood-covered creatures instead, not unlike bloated abyssal fish with a pair of clawed limbs, sometimes more. Unable to destroy the sinister growth, the voidsmen covered it with plasteel hoods until leaving the Immaterium, finally ridding the vessel of the corruption.

Un feuillage luxuriant pousse dans plusieurs salles, des plantes ressemblant vaguement à celles de Terra, mais dont la surface est semblable à du verre poli comme un miroir. Étrangement, le reflet que renvoient les plantes reproduit à la perfection l'environnement qui l'entoure, mais sans aucun être vivant. Ceux qui ont osé s'approcher y ont vu des créatures ubuesques recouvertes de sang, qui ne sont pas sans rappeler les poissons abyssaux boursouflés dotés d'une ou plusieurs paires de membres griffus. Dans l'incapacité de détruire la sinistre croissance, les cosmomarins la recouvrent de chapes de plastacier jusqu'à la sortie de l'Immaterium, qui met automatiquement fin à la corruption.

languages.text: Die Maschinendecks wurden in exotische Gärten verwandelt. In mehreren Kammern sprossen Blätter, die vage den Pflanzen auf Terra ähnelten, allerdings eine glasähnliche, spiegelblanke Oberfläche aufwiesen. Die Spiegelungen in den Pflanzen zeigten alle Objekte in der Umgebung in makelloser Kopie, jedoch kein einziges lebendes Wesen. Wer in die Spiegelblätter blickte, sah stattdessen groteske, mit Blut bedeckte Kreaturen, ganz ähnlich wie aufgedunsene Tiefseefische mit zwei klauenbewehrten Gliedern, manchmal auch mehr. Die Raumfahrer konnten diese gruseligen Pflanzen nicht vernichten, daher bedeckten sie sie mit Plaststahl, bis das Schiff das Immaterium verließ und endlich von dem Befall befreit wurde.
languages.original_text: The engine decks were transformed into exotic gardens. While reflections in the plants perfectly copied the surrounding objects, they did not show a single living being. languages.text: Motor güverteleri, egzotik bahçelere dönütü. Bazı odalarda Terra'daki bitkilere hafifçe benzeyen ancak yüzeyi ayna gibi parlak ve camı andıran yapraklar filizlendi. Bitkilerin yansımaları, çevredeki nesneleri kusursuz bir şekilde kopyalasa da hiçbir canlıyı göstermiyordu. Onlara bakanlar ise grotesk, kanla kaplı, şişkin deniz yaratıklarına benzeyen, bir çift pençeli uzva sahip yaratıklar görüyordu. Bu uğursuz durumun önüne geçemeyen uçsuz erleri, bölgeyi plasçelik kapaklarla kapattı. Geminin Tindiyar'dan çıkmasıyla bu yozlaşmadan nihayet kurtulundu.
languages.original_text: The engine decks were transformed into exotic gardens. Several chambers sprouted foliage vaguely resembling the plants on Terra, although they exhibited a glass-like surface polished to a mirror sheen. While reflections in the plants perfectly copied the surrounding objects, they did not show a single living being. Those who peered into them saw grotesque blood-covered creatures instead, not unlike bloated abyssal fish with a pair of clawed limbs, sometimes more. Unable to destroy the sinister growth, the voidsmen covered it with plasteel hoods until leaving the Immaterium, finally ridding the vessel of the corruption.
